text: Allah bai sanya zũciya biyu ba ga wani namiji a cikinsa, kuma bai sanya mãtanku waɗanda kuke yin zihãri daga gare su, su zama uwãyenku ba, kuma bai sanya ɗiyan hankãkarku su zama ɗiyanku ba. wannan abu nãku, maganarku ce da bãkunanku alhãli kuwa Allah na faɗar gaskiya, kuma Shĩ ne ke shiryarwa ga hanyar ƙwarai
